splitting

Class PriorKnowledgeCARTSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • splitting.Splitter
      • splitting.Binary1FeatureSplitter
        • splitting.CARTSplitter
          • splitting.PriorKnowledgeCARTSplitter

  • public class PriorKnowledgeCARTSplitter
extends CARTSplitter
    RRF like splits. Features that are not considered a priori relevant are penalized (their gini drop is multiplied by a constant between 0 and 1 (default 0.8). See Deng, Houtao, and George Runger. "Feature selection via regularized trees." Neural Networks (IJCNN), The 2012 International Joint Conference on. IEEE, 2012.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • PriorKnowledgeCARTSplitter

    • Method Detail

      • setCoef

        public static void setCoef(double c)
        Sets the multiplicative constant to penalize features
        Parameters:
        c - a number between 0 and 1. The smaller c the more penalized the features

      • setFeatureToFavor

        public static void setFeatureToFavor(boolean[] featToFavor)
        Sets the features to favor. Those variables which are favored are not penalized (the original gini drop value is kept).
        Parameters:
        featToFavor - featToFavor[i] iff variable i is not penalized.

      • getSplitAndIndex

        protected UnivariateSplit getSplitAndIndex(int feat)
        Description copied from class: Binary1FeatureSplitter
        This method should be overwritten to compute the best split for a particular feature.
        Overrides:
        getSplitAndIndex in class CARTSplitter
        Parameters:
        feat - a feature of tree.getData() for which we compute the best split on only points in tree.getSampleIds()
        Returns:
        an array of two elements
        1. the value leading to the best split
        2. the corresponding metric value
